name: Pesky Animals
description:
Hello everyone, this is my first finished game. Relieve some stress jumping on enemies, with keyboard or controller. It's just a simple game made in Unity, all of the art and sounds were free assets, except a few sprites that I modified. I made this game to practice some skills and to try implementing some things that I haven't used before. It's far from perfect, there might be a few buggy mechanics, and the menus are pretty meh, but they work.

Anyways give it a play and let me know what you think. Hope you enjoy it, thanks!
